response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value and significance. This product, tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations, is worth an incredible $1,000,000 to you. I understand its importance and thus propose to sell it to you at a special offer price of $950,000. This offer represents a remarkable saving of $50,000 compared to its full value, providing you with exceptional savings while securing a high-quality asset. I trust this proposal will resonate well with your financial considerations and aligns with your aspirations. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you require any further information to make an informed decision.", "product_price": 950000}
